segments.text: Are you okay , man ? You don ’ t look very well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ugh , I feel terrible . I went out last night with Trevor , and things got a little out of hand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice ! So , where did you guys go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We hit a couple of local bars , and met up with some friends . Everything was cool until Mike came along , and it turned out that it was his birthday yesterday !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh no ! Mike ’ s birthday is a drinkfest for sure !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me about it ! We drank everything in the bar !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that why you missed work today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . I woke up this morning feeling really nauseous . I threw up like five times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was so dehydrated that I drank like a gallon of water , and my head has been pounding all day . I swear , I ’ m never gonna drink again !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Too bad man , tonight is Tracy ’ s going away party and she asked if you were gonna go .
segments.speaker: S1
